name: Live your cards
description:
The game is about choosing between random oportunities that show up to your character.

Each choice will contribute toward one of the life pillars : Power, Social and health. The objective of the game is see how far you can go in one life, measuring your progress trought the amount of points you do on each of the  pillars and, at the end, your final total score is shown.

Have a good life!

All the game inputs are made using the mouse

Bug fix (29/04/2019) - Fixed an error where on the end game menu the buttons wasn't sending the player to the correct screen.
